name: Dire Centipede
description: The Dire Centipede is a large, venomous beast that is capable of climbing difficult surfaces and even ceilings with ease. Its body is segmented with many legs and a powerful bite.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze foes with its venomous bite makes it a formidable opponent in battle.
goals: Typically hunts for prey to incapacitate and consume.
relations: May relate to other large insects or venomous creatures.
environment: Often found in caves or dark environments where it can use its blindsight advantage.
strengths: Highly mobile due to its climbing ability and venomous attacks that can incapacitate prey.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma, affecting its tactical decisions.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing and poison damage, with a chance to paralyze the target.
most_powerful_ability: Paralyzing bite that can incapacitate seasoned warriors.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect movement in total darkness.
additional_information: Strong mobility allows it to traverse difficult terrain easily.
Can climb on ceilings, making ambush tactics effective.
Its venom can severely debilitate foes.
Low Intelligence means it lacks strategic combat awareness.
Has average durability with its Constitution score.
test_queries: venomous beast that glides on ceilings
dire centipede mobility and paralysis ability
